item.title: 开始一天生活所需的五件事欧洲
item.description:
及时了解市场监测情况

Get up to speed with what the markets are monitoring

】

item.title: 不可动摇的经济阻挡不可抗拒的地缘风险
item.description:
美国竭力应对中东紧张局势的加剧，但石油可能会在大选前一路飙升。与此同时，特朗普在预测市场上获益匪浅。【原文：

The US digs in against rising Mideast tensions, but oil could ride them all the way to the election. Meanwhile, Trump gains in prediction markets.

】

item.title: 据说 INCJ 正在恢复出售电信塔运营商 Edotco 的股份
item.description: 据知情人士透露，日本创新网络公司（Innovation Network Corp.【原文：Innovation Network Corp. of Japan is reviving the sale of its 21% stake in Malaysian telecommunications tower company Edotco Group Sdn., people with knowledge of the matter said.】

item.title: 中国经济刺激政策令人失望，人民币拉低亚洲外汇汇率
item.description: 中国在岸人民币创下一年多来最糟糕的一天，拖累一系列亚洲货币走软，原因是交易商收回了对世界第二大经济体的乐观押注。【原文：China’s onshore yuan had its worst day in more than a year, pulling a range of Asian currencies weaker as traders rolled back optimistic bets on the world’s second-largest economy.】

item.title: 中国市场节后复市要点，发改委简报
item.description: 中国股市在黄金周休市后重新开盘，投资者希望国家发展和改革委员会将出台更多刺激措施。以下是今日事件的主要信息。点击这里查看我们的 TOPLive 博客：【原文：Chinese markets reopened following their Golden Week break with investors hoping the National Development and Reform Commission would outline more stimulus measures. Here are the key takeaways from today’s events. Click here for our TOPLive blog:】

item.title: 尼克-坎迪誓言以超豪华住宅超越阿联酋开发商
item.description: 尼克-坎迪（Nick Candy）是伦敦 "海德公园一号"（One Hyde Park）开发项目的幕后老板，他将目光转向了中东，并承诺在这个以奢华著称的地区树立新的奢华标杆。【原文：Nick Candy, one half of the sibling duo behind London’s One Hyde Park development, is turning his attentions to the Middle East and promising to set new benchmarks for luxury in a region that’s already well known for its opulence.】

item.title: 韩国金融监督机构调查 "过热 "的韩国锌业争夺战
item.description: 韩国金融监管机构将调查韩国锌业公司收购战中可能存在的不公平交易行为，这场争夺世界顶级金属精炼商的战斗愈演愈烈。【原文：South Korea’s financial watchdog will investigate potential unfair trading practices around the takeover battle for Korea Zinc Co., as the fight for the world’s top refiner of the metal intensifies.】

item.title: 随着休闲目的地的转移，雅高仍在中国 "下重注
item.description: 据雅高集团（Accor SA）称，中国游客对探索人迹罕至景点的兴趣与日俱增，推动了 "后科维德时代 "的旅游热潮，并支撑了中国黄金周假期的强劲需求。【原文：Chinese tourists’ growing interest in exploring sites off the beaten path are sustaining a post-Covid travel boom and underpinned robust demand during the country’s Golden Week holiday, according to Accor SA.】

item.title: 新加坡公民免签证进入印尼巴淡岛和民丹岛
item.description: 印度尼西亚将对持有新加坡永久居留权的外国人免签访问巴淡岛、民丹岛和卡里蒙群岛，旨在促进这些区域经济区的旅游业和投资。【原文：Indonesia will give visa-free entry to foreigners holding Singapore permanent residency to visit Batam, Bintan and the Karimun Islands, aiming to boost tourism and investment in the regional economic zones.】

item.title: 美国陪审团称 Cognizant 歧视非印度裔工人
item.description: 美国陪审团裁定，Cognizant Technology Solutions Corp. 公司存在歧视非印第安工人的行为模式，应支付惩罚性赔偿金，以补偿受到伤害的员工。【原文：Cognizant Technology Solutions Corp. engaged in a pattern of discriminatory conduct toward non-Indian workers and should pay punitive damages to compensate employees who suffered harm, a US jury found.】

item.title: 尽管投资转向中国，印度股市仍保持乐观
item.description: 在交易日开始之前，我们为您带来可能影响市场的重要新闻和事件摘要。今天我们关注【原文：Before the trading day starts we bring you a digest of the key news and events that are likely to move markets. Today we look at:】

item.title: 中国誓言实现经济目标，但不会采取大规模刺激措施
item.description: 中国表示有信心实现今年的经济目标，并承诺进一步支持经济增长，但在释放更多刺激政策方面却有所保留，这令那些希望为全球股市上涨提供更多动力的投资者感到失望。【原文：China said it’s confident in reaching its economic targets this year and promised further support for growth, although it held back in unleashing more stimulus in a disappointment to investors looking for more fuel for a world-beating stock rally.】

item.title: 越南与法国提升关系至全面战略合作伙伴关系
item.description: 越南和法国同意将两国外交关系升级为东南亚国家最高级别的全面战略伙伴关系。【原文：Vietnam and France agreed to upgrade diplomatic relations between the two countries to a comprehensive strategic partnership, the Southeast Asian country’s highest level.】

item.title: 在国际货币基金组织（IMF）的救助下，巴基斯坦税收增加，抗议活动随之蔓延
item.description: 从纸面上看，巴基斯坦与国际货币基金组织达成的 70 亿美元救助协议似乎是不可避免的。一段时期的严重通货膨胀、外汇储备枯竭和其他经济冲击将这个南亚国家推向了违约的边缘。【原文：On paper, Pakistan’s deal with the International Monetary Fund for a $7 billion bailout seemed like an inevitability. A period of crushing inflation, depleted foreign currency reserves and other economic shocks pushed the South Asian nation to the brink of default.】

item.title: 世界银行警告中国经济放缓可能加深，给东亚带来压力
item.description: 世界银行预计，即使最近的刺激措施暂时推动了经济增长，中国的经济增长在 2025 年仍将进一步减弱，从而给地区经济带来额外压力。【原文：The World Bank expects China’s growth to weaken further in 2025 even with a temporary boost from recent stimulus measures, putting extra strain on regional economies.】

item.title: 药明康德通过出售可转换债券融资 5 亿美元
item.description: 药明康德公司正在通过出售可转换债券融资 5 亿美元，成为最新一家利用这种工具降低融资成本的中国公司。【原文：WuXi AppTec Co. is raising $500 million through the sale of convertible bonds, becoming the latest Chinese company to turn to the instrument to reduce funding costs.】

item.title: 日本央行超长收益率缺口接近二十年来最大
item.description: 相对于短期债券，日本期限最长的政府债券收益率已攀升至近二十年来的高点，因为投资者认为日本央行将推迟进一步加息。【原文：Yields on Japan’s longest-maturity government bonds relative to shorter debt have climbed to near two-decade highs as investors position for the central bank to delay further interest-rate hikes.】

item.title: 日本 8 月购买美国主权债券数量创历史新高
item.description: 日本财务省周二公布的最新国际收支数据显示，在国债反弹的背景下，日本基金在 8 月份购买了创纪录数量的美国主权债券。【原文：Japanese funds bought a record amount of US sovereign bonds in August amid a rally in Treasuries, the latest balance-of-payments data from the country’s Ministry of Finance showed on Tuesday.】

item.title: 中国股市假期归来反弹，香港股市下滑
item.description: 随着中国股市在长达一周的假期后恢复交易，在岸上市的中国股市跳涨，令人鼓舞的房屋销售和消费数据为中国政府的刺激政策所引发的反弹提供了新的动力。香港股市则出现下滑。【原文：Chinese stocks listed onshore jumped as trading resumed following a week-long holiday, with encouraging home sales and consumption data giving fresh impetus to a rally sparked by Beijing’s stimulus blitz. Those in Hong Kong slid.】

item.title: 马克-莫比乌斯认为中国股市在增长支撑下将有更多上涨空间
item.description: 马克-莫比斯（Mark Mobius）说，如果政策制定者继续推出支持市场的措施，中国股市的涨势可能会持续下去。【原文：Mark Mobius said the rally in Chinese stocks may continue if policymakers continue to roll out measures to support the market.】

item.title: 节后中国主权债券延续刺激政策引发的低迷走势
item.description: 中国政府债券在一周假期后恢复交易时下跌，原因是市场押注中国政府的刺激政策可能会延续股市的历史性反弹，从而导致对避险资产的需求下降。【原文：China’s government bonds declined as trading resumed after a one-week holiday, as demand for haven assets dropped amid bets a historic stock rally may extend thanks to Beijing’s stimulus blitz.】

item.title: 中国未能推出新的刺激措施，金属价格下滑
item.description: 铁矿石从五个月高点下滑，基本金属下跌，原因是备受关注的中国最高经济规划者的简报会结束时，没有做出增加政府支出的新承诺。【原文：Iron ore slumped from a five-month high and base metals fell, as a much-anticipated briefing by China’s top economic planner ended without new pledges to boost government spending.】

item.title: 图片报》文件错误显示向中国银行下注 150 亿美元
item.description: 据瑞士资产管理公司称，香港交易所的一份文件错误地显示，皮克泰资产管理公司（Pictet Asset Management）对中国建设银行股份有限公司进行了 1212 亿港元（156 亿美元）的投资。【原文：A Hong Kong Exchange filing erroneously showed that Pictet Asset Management made a HK$121.2 billion ($15.6 billion) investment in China Construction Bank Corp., according to the Swiss asset manager.】

item.title: 澳大利亚央行发出信号：在对价格有信心之前暂缓执行关键利率
item.description: 澳大利亚中央银行上一次董事会会议记录显示，该行将把利率维持在目前的 12 年高位，直到确信通胀率正在可持续地向目标区间移动，这表明宽松政策仍有待时日。【原文：Australia’s central bank will hold interest rates at the current 12-year high until it’s confident that inflation is moving sustainably toward its target band, minutes of the last board meeting showed, suggesting policy easing still remains some way off.】

item.title: 中国市场黄金周后重新开市 交易员关注更多刺激措施
三星业绩令人失望，人工智能芯片与竞争对手差距依然存在
item.description: 三星电子公司公布的利润和收入低于市场预期，加剧了其关键芯片部门前景的不确定性。【原文：Samsung Electronics Co. posted profit and revenue that fell short of market expectations, stoking uncertainty about the outlook of its pivotal chip division.】

item.title: 澳大利亚本季暖海域将出现更多强力气旋
item.description: 据澳大利亚气象机构称，本季度澳大利亚可能会遭遇数量超过平均水平的强热带气旋，这些气旋有可能破坏农作物并淹没采矿作业。【原文：Australia is likely to see an above average number of severe tropical cyclones this season, according to the nation’s weather agency, which have the potential to damage crops and flood mining operations.】

item.title: 开始一天生活所需的五件事亚洲
item.description: 早上好科技巨头拖累股市走低。美国债券溃败加深。中国券商为疯狂的周二做好准备。市场动态如下。【原文：Good morning. Tech megacaps drag stocks lower. US bond rout deepens. Brokerages in China gear up for a frantic Tuesday. Here’s what’s moving markets. —Isabelle Lee】

item.title: 银行利用香港贴现窗口获取 2019 年以来最多资金
item.description: 香港银行向当局借入了近五年来最大一笔短期现金，此举表明对流动资金的需求突然增加。【原文：Hong Kong banks borrowed the largest amount of short-term cash in almost five years from authorities, a move pointing to a sudden demand for liquidity.】

item.title: 中国公开赛前中东紧张局势缓和，石油上涨
item.description: 由于中东紧张局势加剧，投资者为中国市场在一周假期后重新开市做准备，石油连续第六个交易日上涨。【原文：Oil advanced for a sixth straight session on mounting tensions in the Middle East, as investors prepared for the reopening of Chinese markets after a week-long holiday.】
